AboutMe: I have advanced degrees in behavioral psychology and education, so my approach to linguistics is from that perspective. Although most of my work is aimed at solving organizational problems, one of my pet interests is how pre-training could increase the number of competent (say, 3/3) linguists graduating from foreign language programs. I think pre-selection for these programs has gone as far as it can go, and now we need to look at pre-training. US Navy SEALs increased their yield from about 15% to 25% with pre-training.
